reviewtext: Works great. after all how difficult could it be to make a good floppy drive.I was thinking of getting a used one, but this one is cheaper and gives peace of mind.- compared it with sony external usb and found this one cheaper.- very sturdy, dropped couple of times but it still works.- very plug and play.- never gave me a chance to complain.- works comparaeable to my sony vaio integrated floopy drive
summary: what else can you ask for???
